meanings.definition: A sum paid for killing or capturing a person or animal.

meanings.sent2: In the old west, wanted posters offered a bounty for outlaws.

meanings.sent4: The hunter set out to claim the bounty for the rare white tiger.
meanings.sent5: The government issued a bounty for the capture of the dangerous criminal.
